WorkItem.Description:
at first I have to say that you make a really great job! thanks

Is it possible to provide the duration of a tour? I need this for optimizing.

Comments.Message:
t = S / V; // ;}


** Closed by radioman 10/13/2009 2:32 AM

I know this formula! But this is very unexact because of the variable speed during the whole tour.

Is there no way to get the duration of a tour? The web-client of google maps provides the user the duration!?
and what formula are they using? ;}
you can try parse info from GMapRoute.Name
